rooms.description: A minimalistic foyer with a built-in storage area and a small seating space, aligning with Vastu guidelines for the entrance.

A combined open kitchen and living space designed with minimalist aesthetics. Features include an integrated island counter, modern fixtures, and ample natural light from north-eastern windows to promote positivity.
A dedicated workspace located in a quiet corner of the ground floor. Designed with ergonomic furniture and ample natural light from east windows to boost productivity.
A functional bathroom with tiled finishes and essential fixtures. Placement respects Vastu guidelines by being located away from the main living areas.
